content.detailedDescription: I looked up while having a smoke outside and a craft from the west appeared and was heading east. clearly a disc shaped object with two pulsating lights at front with windows in the middle. object was very low and no sound. flew by and went behind houses. only visable for 5 seconds. was not a plane...
content.summary: Disc shaped craft flew by with two pulsating front lights

content.detailedDescription:
Out walking dog, was taking random photos of lake taupo,
found ufo when looking thru old photos, did not see it when taking photos.

cell phone camera, vodafone 985n
content.summary: Found ufo when looking thru old photos, did not see it when taking photo.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were camping at new melones lake looking up at the stars at approx. 10:30 pm. we both noticed a craft that had an exceptionally bright light on the exterior slowing moving towards us from the north. about 10 seconds later we observed the exterior light on the craft becoming significantly brighter to the point that it dully illuminated our campsite, similar to a police helicopter spotlight but this craft was over a mile away and made no noise. the object then appeared to split into two separate craft flying side by side 5 seconds later followed by an abrupt 90 degree turn and sped off at a very high rate of acceleration covering a distance of at least 5 miles in under half a second all while making no noise. no drugs or alcohol were involved. we were both in awe at what we had witnessed and somewhat afraid. i am not sure if the craft(s) we observed were in the shape of a sphere or if that was just the external lights.
content.summary: A single white light that spit into two seperate craft then illuminated our campsite

content.detailedDescription: On 10-12-2016 at approximately 1145 hours, in post falls, idaho i heard a loud sonic boom, went out front door looking south and observed what appeared to be some type of large rectangular object tumbling end over end emitting a large amount of smoke (white, gray and yellowish in color) the smoke trail as it fell was  about 4 to 5 times the width of a typical airliner contrail and in was going straight down toward the ground. at one point during this approximately 4 min fall, it appeared some type of engine maybe briefly came on and emitted what looked like what could be a jet engine trying to start or work but then it stopped and the trail became non symmetrical again. i got binoculars and tried to view it and while falling it intermittently  reflected sunlight as it tumbled. the object appeared to be about the size of a very large military cargo plane or bigger, but more rectangular in shape. the object disappeared behind the mountains to the south of post falls and no doubt what ever it was hit the ground somewhere based on rate of fall and trajectory. after the object disappeared i called spokane faa tower and they said thanks but did not as any question or details.
content.summary: Heard sonic boom looked south observed some type craft falling from sky slowly making lots of smoke disappeared behind mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the front porch watching grandson.
my grandson was staring at the sky.
i did not know what it was when i saw it.
it was an elongated teardrop with 2 small stubby wings from the bottom, it was going south east almost like it floated.There was no vapor trail and no sound. it was going straight and ascending.
content.summary: Silver teardrop with two small straight wings on bottom near the back and around 8 large square blacked out windows

content.detailedDescription: I was shooting a slow-mo video of a helicopter flying over the beach, when i noticed during playback, a very fast moving object immediately above the rotating propellors of the helicopter, at approximately 15 seconds into the video. i just don't have an explanation what this could be....Something obviously very fast since this is a slow mo video.
content.summary: Very fast moving object of 'white fuzz'

content.detailedDescription:
We, my 15yr old daughter and i, were driving home in a residential area. as we made our way on a rounded bend in the street, we saw 2 objects in the sky. the time was 8:30pm, the sky was dark with stars shining, no reported clouds. object #1 (o1) was gently falling towards the ground and object #2 (o2) was dancing around o1. we were looking south-east in albuquerque, nm towards the sandia foothills and manzano mountain range. the distance away seem about 20 miles at 45 degrees in the sky. i stopped the car and got out to see if i could hear any thing, no sound to report besides average night life. 
i asked my daughter if there was a laser light show since the abq balloon glow fest was in full swing in the north west section of town. she did not know. i asked her if it was a hovering -laser toy that are seen at fairs. we believed it was not. the distance was too great from the festivities in the valley, and no clouds were visible if a laser light show was occurring, and was away from he spectators. it was not fire works. 
after removing all known possible factors, we decided they were unknown objects. we watched the 2 objects awe. o1 was larger, and slowly fell in a straight line to the ground over the tree line. it was very bright, changing colors..Red, green, blue, yellow, etc. it was very colorful. o2 was a large white star-size that danced and circled around o1. the event took place in 3-5 minutes. after they disappeared in the tree line, we got back into the car and drove home in the direction of the siting. we were not able to tell where it landed, if it did, but possiblly on the outskirts of abq.
content.summary: Witnessed flashing round object gently falling to ground with sm star dancing around it.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just sat down in my back yard facing the north talking to my daughter when i observed what i first thought to be a soaring bird quite a ways a way. after about 10 seconds, i noticed the object was tumbling in place. i retrieved my binoculars and viewed the object closer. it was a football shaped object that tumbled/wobbled slowly and i could detect a shiny/reflective surface as sun light illuminated it when it was broadside to the setting sun, appearing to flash. object appeared to be very dark, almost black. it slowly became smaller as it moved towards the north and became obstructed by my neighbors house. no sound was heard.  no photo attempted, object too small / too far away for iphone resolution. 

beale air force base is due north of me 27 nm.
content.summary: Witnessed with binoculars a stationary oblong football shape that tumbled inplace and slowly drifted to the north.

content.detailedDescription: Walking down my street after finishing a night shift when i noticed a bright orb on the horrizon as i watched it moved to one side then back before accending through the cloud i took 2 photos of which 1 is very interesting indeed
content.summary: Bright orb shape slight move left the right before accendind through aloud

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a pic of an iridescent cloud, did not notice the objects while i was taking the photo, it wasn't till i downloaded the photos to my computer, at first i thought it was a dust speck on my lens but once i zoomed in, i saw the object at the top of the photo. there is a second one in the middle of the photo, it's between two leaves, third branch from the left, a white bright light can be seen when zoomed in. the white line is just a spider web.
content.summary: Black band in the middle, white/slanted pointed top

content.detailedDescription: While standing outside my door,looking across the hudson river i observed lights in the sky ,they were red ,white & yellow. they were also pulsating. what caught my eye is that they were not moving just stationary.Seemed much larger than the usual airplane lights. i observed them for about 25 min. they were stationary the entire time. i also recorded the instance for a few minutes. after about 30 min. the lights flew off in a southerly direction,steady linear path. i also saw planes and helicopters flying above and around the lights. just for informational purposes on the other side of the river where i viewed the lights,there is a nucular power plant.
content.summary: A hovering light that changed in color

content.detailedDescription: I was in balcony watching some guys. suddenly i saw in sky to star but one star is changeing colour fast i thaught it is a airoplane bt after sometime i saw its like star or o like its roaming around and going top and disappear
content.summary: Main balcony mai tha jab yea hua mujai laga helicopter yea phir plane that but nahi dono mai sai koi nai tha mai jab 5min ek dam dhyan said dek ka tab pata chl ki wp ufo hai

content.detailedDescription: I took pictures of what seems to be a military air plane today 9/23. i took 3 separate pics just about 2 seconds apart and on the 3rd picture there seems to be an oblong object just behind the exhaust trail. i noticed another identical airplane minutes before i took the photos i just curious to see what the 2nd airplane was doing so i took 3 photos with my cellular phone as the 2nd airplane was descending to fyi fresno yosemite international airport. seems i the object just appeared suddenly. i really can't explain it. you would need to see for yourselves.
content.summary: Saw shiny sliver oblong object behind an airplane

content.detailedDescription:
I was at oak canyon park sitting at our campsite watching the sunset. the sunset time on this day was 6:28pm and it was approximately a little after the sun had set as it was dusk and the clouds were still orange.

i noticed a glowing orb about 45 degrees up from the horizon and i noticed it because it was a red color. it was a little larger than a star or an aircraft would be in the distance, so i thought it could be either one of these or even a planet. 

the object hovered for a bit and then shot straight up into the sky and disappeared. i lost sight because it disappeared into sky. 

i think right after i saw this i was somewhat in shock but wasn't surprised that i had seen one. now that i reflect back on it i wish i had made a bigger deal and tried to take a picture.
content.summary: Glowing red orb hovered then shot straight up into the sky and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
The object was discovered in my chin which appeared for a number of years to be just a bump, and then hair which was really bothersome. i experienced headaches and rapid dental decay. the object did not show up on full dental x-rays.

one night after shaving, (razors were getting nicked on this object, but i didn't realize at the time this was the cause), i decided to try and pull the hair out since it was scratchy, and finally a bit was visible. after several months of working at it, i was finally able to extract the object which appeared to be a tiny metal spiral pointed on both ends. when trying to observe the object in any detail closely, my vision would blur, or if aided with magnifying lens, it would shift out of focus.

the clearest shot (image) of the object (which i still posses the physical object), is presented in the image which i was able to do after zooming in as best i can without seeing any distortions. a picture without zooming in was more distorted on the object itself. the object itself is inside of a plastic zip-lock bag, and aside from out of focus properties, it appears to be dormant if it did serve any other purpose. i have held onto the object until i was able to figure out what to do with it.

i do not recall any event or potential event in my past which could have cause this to be inserted into my chin (assuming that is it's original location), or anywhere else.
content.summary: Spiral metallic object extracted from chin

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my house waiting for my kids to get on the bus, when i saw something out the corner of my eye that made me turn my head very quickly! i thought it was a shooting star but it was daytime, and a little gloomy out but the object was very bright and too big to be a shooting star i thought. it was coming down very quickly with only two quick pauses in its decent. and i could see that it was not far from me judging by the eye that is. it had to have landed right in the middle of the woods between two houses ! i was in shock and awe ! as soon as it was out of my sight i called my friend and was like " someone better get to explaining or i'm about to be a true believer in aliens!👀
content.summary: It was very bright and not all the way cone shaped

content.detailedDescription: Comes and goes. sits in one of two locations in the sky. ne or sw in night sky. does not seem to move most times. wife and i witness this from time to time. usually appears as a flashing glowing light in the night sky. east and west sightings could be separate objects. pictures are of different objects. when i send the pictures enlarge them for shape of the object. i seem to have captured two nebula also. these are regular sighting east and north. i have ten more pictures. they have to be enlarges to see clearly.
content.summary: Noticed a red green glowing object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a train to college - specifically from the town of march to peterborough - and when the train was reaching whittlesey i noticed two white dots in the sky (i always look out of the window on the train). at first i thought it was two helicopters but the dots weren't moving, or if they were they were moving at the exact same speed which i knew wouldn't be possible, and i didn't see any blades or anything. eventually i realized the white "dots" were light being reflected off of something metal and dish-shaped. as soon as i started looking i was paralyzed and couldn't move, i wanted to get my phone to take a photo but i physically couldn't move, i just kept thinking "i should take a photo so people believe me" and that i needed to share what i'd seen - it seemed really important to share it. 
the craft hovered for about 30 seconds then moved straight upwards above the clouds as the train passed a bunch of trees that obscured the sky - when the sky was visible again, the craft had disappeared above the clouds. i was scared but interested, i felt entranced.
content.summary: Looking out of train window, saw ufo, paralyzed for 30 sec while watching

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home i saw a bright flashing light in the sky above,  it grabbed my attention because it was hovering so low!! i immediately pulled out my phone and snapped a few pictures. i was trying to drive, observe this crazy object and take pictures all at the same time. i was so freaked out, then i look to my left and i see more, except these were at a farther distance away and appeared much smaller. i didn't know what to think, there were so many of these moving flashing light objects flying around in the distance, these also seemed to be flying a bit higher but still low enough for them to be noticeable!  once i get home i'm telling my husband all about it and showing him the pictures, he didn't seemed too concerned and made me feel kind of crazy for "seeing what i saw." a couple hours later i was outside and saw the same low flying object fly over near where i live, it was traveling very fast!! i ran inside to get my husband, and with no urgency and rolling of his eyes, he takes his sweet time, as i'm yelling for him to hurry! by the time he came out the object had passed behind trees and could no longer see it, i just wanted him to believe me. throughout that night i could look in far distance of each direction of the sky and could see tons of tiny moving lights all around! there were just so many! my husband said they were airplanes, well i had never seen airplanes fly that low around where we live and that many! we may see a couple of planes high in the sky fly by at night but nothing like this! no one can change my beliefs of what i saw!
content.summary: I saw this bright flashing odd shaped thing hovering right above me (3 flashing lights), looked to my left maybe a mile away and say tons more but those were moving!

content.detailedDescription: On 10.11.2016, at approximately 12:00pm noon, i arrived at my home in a subdivision in canton, ga. i noticed 4 large jet trails in the sky above my neighborhood.  i thought that they must be from some jets or planes.  i was looking up to see if i could see the jets that made the white lines in the sky.  as i was scanning the white lines up and down, i noticed a white object that was traveling in the opposite direction of the direction that the jets had previously flown & it was moving along the smoke trails, seeming to be observing the smoke trails left by the jets. the object would occasionally stop, drop into & past the smoke trails, then pop back up above the smoke trails. it would change from a round shape, to a diamond shape, to a rectangle shape, then to a flat shape. when a commercial jet approached the object from the west, as the object traveled north, the object became dim, as if it had cloaked itself, then reappeared in it's stationary position, after the airliner had passed.  i ran inside my home to get my wife & i also wrang my neighbor's doorbell.  both my wife & neighbor came outside to witness the object.  the object that was traveling north had dissappeared, but an object was traveling east toward the jet smoke trails was observed by all 3 of us.  we all witnessed this second object, as it turned abruptly to travel north, along the smoke trails.  this object was also white, but changed shapes more rapidly and seemed to rotate at times.  all 3 of us felt like we had seen a ufo.  my neighbor asked if it could be a drone, but it was too high and changed shapes & directions, so abrubtly, so it is not a drone. i took pictures & video of the objects.  i also called a ufo report line in seattle, wa & left a voice mail for a local tv news desk.  the object moved out of sight and my wife & neighbor went inside.  i then observed the 4 fighter jets flying back south, again overhead, in the same direction as the first flight overhead, leaving another 4 lines of smoke trails.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Shape changing, multidirectional, white object after 4 fighter jets flew overhead, observing smoke trail left by the jets. two witnesses observed second object with me, after first object left area after cloaking & reappearing when commercial jet flew nea

content.detailedDescription: My dad was outside and called me out to see these lights that were going up and down into the treeline. these orange orbs of light would go into the sky and hover for a couple seconds and then they would either completely disappear or go back down into the trees. after a couple minutes they started making formations in the sky so i grabbed my phone and took a few videos and pictures. we saw about 15 orbs of light. thier were no blinking lights on these orbs but they were very bright!
content.summary: About 15 orbs of lights were going up and down and making shapes up in the skylike triangles and rectangles and the some light would just disappear

content.detailedDescription: I was going north on hwy 75 in the afternoon, i was between north salem and 800n. an object caught my attention it was a brownish colored square with 4 large circles on the side i could see.I watched it until it flew into the side of a tall thunder head cloud.
content.summary: I was traveling north on hwy 75 and saw object up near cloud top , it flew west into cloud.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
1) driving from residence to nearby gas station for a soda and orange juice for the morning. 
2) stationary lights in a w or chevron wedge above my head with some unusual light patterns.
silent.
3) airplane -- i am in the flight path of a municipal airfield and planes go directly over my home to land approx 200 yards away. small craft but slow and low -- usually very loud but not enough to be alarmed.
4) figured it was a plane. no accompanying sound before during or after. nice weather had window down driver's side and sunroof was open. also, it isn't moving. most planes move.
5) light pattern changed when it glided onward ahead of me, banked sharply as a lazy course correction of sort. couldn't recall if lights were in a pattern of changing it was soon far ahead of me and i can't tell if i lost sight from clouds or just distance or some other intervention. 

i first felt odd for a plane holding still in the air. then it wasn't like most planes i have seen. then it accelerated away faster than a car could, even a fun car. also it was above me and quickly rolled to the right to be going more ssw than sw. it was loosely following the road. 

i had an idea in my head of a mantis-like creature in a cockpit style layout like you would see on a combat plane but the canopy was opaque. i wasn't close enough to see if it even had a canopy or cockpit this is just purely what popped into my head. 

possible biases; i am interested in ufos and have read john mack's book and used to listen to art bell years ago when i could stay up that late and not suffer for it! i try to look up more often just in case. i had a praying mantis on my living room window a few weeks ago. i'm probably not a great witness because of my desire to see something like that. on the other hand it was pretty anticlimactic since it was over in seconds. maybe ten seconds stationary and then one second quick dart and the it did a little bank or roll and was gone in another second or two. i honestly thought for a moment it knew that it was spotted but i don't know how since i kept moving the whole time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Almost as if waiting for a turn signal

content.detailedDescription: West of kalamazoo i saw a bright green light in the sky that was moving quickly from the northwest to southeast. it then went over me and i could see that it was in fact not a plane or helicopter or drone. it was black triangle with two red lights on the rear points and a green light on the front point. i shut off my car and listened but no sound was heard. as soon as i did so the red lights shut off and the craft flew away very quickly. alouth silwnt it was much too fast to be a drone, and too quiet to be a helicopter or plane. the last glimps of the object was as it sped quickly away to the southeast towards south kalamazoo.
content.summary: Fast moving light then got closer and could see outline of triangle with three lights on each end when hovering.

content.detailedDescription: My neighbors and i saw no less than 20-30 ufos between 11pm-12:30 tonight in the southern skies over los angeles. we live on the westside by the beach and were on our apt. building's roof when we began to see yellowish lights beginning to appear over the city. one by one they started to flicker and become visible forming a loose linear formation south of us and east of lax. they started hovering and forming triangles while continuing to pop "in and out" and a few even descended below the tree line out of our view. they begin to move out over the ocean and started blinking alternating blue, green, white and red lights in unison, some taking of into the distance at impossible speeds, while others sort of hung in the air closer to the shore. as this was happening we continued to see more ufos "popping in" south over the city and taking the same path west out over the ocean and then back south. this was seriously a fleet of ufos.  this morning local news reported mysterious large power outage in the torrance, inglewood area in early morning hours of the morning. possibly unrelated but this was definitely the area it looked like the ufos were appearing and dipping below the treeline.
content.summary: Saw no less than 20-30 yellow orbs appear in the skies south east of venice beach, ca.

content.detailedDescription: My friend shane and i we sitting on his tailgate. the sky was clear. i was just looking up at the stars when i noticed some strange lights way above us. i brought this to shane's attention and so we watched. it looked like a couple white lights squiggly get in all different directions. i was mesmerized, but frightened. i immediately thought ufo. so did shane. we were both pretty shaken by the sight. i'm in my 30s, he's in his 40s and neither of us have ever seen anything like this before. at some points while these lights were moving erratically, the trails on them were bigger than some constellations! i'm still freaked out! shane's relative in virginia or maryland (can't remember) said he say it too. we've been talking about it since then, so i went on google to see if there was any other sightings. nothing yet. i just want to know if anything has been documented or any type of event occurred on that day.
content.summary: Squiggly white lights that at times left long trails

content.detailedDescription:
At around 4 o clock and 5:30 a.M.
everyone was sleeping i was outside smoking a cigarette when suddenly a flash of light from red to really bright white illumination filled my outer vision when i focused on the object i had felt that it was so kind of angle with a glare of a cross like looking into headlights would flash really white then nothing really white and nothing agagain my phone was charging when it was at its closest point of earth so i was never able to capture it i noticed it was moving when it hovered back and forth from side to side like it was evading an enemy missile the i would see flashes of red from this orb of light flickering rotating and evading something in space when my camera finally turned on i realized it was the only visible star which was weird but i continued to record and it disappeared and then appeared again in a different location like a cloaking device of some esthra i zoomed in and seen that it was triangular in shape and rotating quickly i finished smoking woke my brother in law up but when i returned outside it was gone.
content.summary: Was sitting out side smoking cig when flashing light caught my eye

content.detailedDescription: I was walking the dog when i noticed two orb in the sky flying form ne to se. both orbs were flying in wiggly lines and there was no sound. i could only watch them for a few seconds before they just vanished into thin air, one after the other. i kept walking with my dog and searched the sky for them but i could not see them anymore. what i could see was that a few seconds after the orbs disappeared there were two flashes within the cloud cover. i am used to air planes flying over my head due to the cologne airport but these two objects did not behave like airplanes or helicopters.
content.summary: 2 orbs flying in wiggly lines before they vanished into thin air

content.altitude: Landed, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Sitting in the mountains in las vegas nevada i observed a bright light that flashed no other color but white and it moved from right to left southeast to northeast but when i noticed it it paused for a few seconds then continue to move on and once it moved it disappeared in the speed faster than anything it will planes and helicopters actually coming in to land and literally that object was above them.
content.summary: Flash diamond like colors then hyper drive

content.detailedDescription:
As i was driving in to work at 7:30am on 8/8/2014, i saw a shadow on the road approx. 1/4 mile ahead of my vehicle.  i looked up and saw the triangle or chevron shaped craft hovering just east of the highway at about 250-300 feet agl.  it appeared to be about the size of an f-111 aardvark.  as i got closer it accelerated quickly to the south and i lost sight of it within a few seconds.  the curious thing about the craft was that it had no definable color.  instead, it was slightly blurred out as if mimicking the background. the outline was fairly clear, but it was almost semi-transparent.  the thing that struck me was that the shadow of the craft was directly below it instead of where it should have been given the angle of the sun that early in the morning.  i've included a sketch that i drew as soon as i got to work that morning that describes this phenomenon.

i'm a former usaf security policeman and i've worked around nuclear weapons under the prp.  i've also been a civilian law enforcement officer, so my observational skills are pretty good.  i was also wearing polarized prescription sunglasses that morning, which is why i may have been able to see it in the first place.
content.summary: Saw a triangle shaped craft hovering above highway, then it took off to the south.
